title: Multi-line strings
postscript: You can write "\n" in any string to add a line break inside your text.
question: This code creates multi-line strings correctly – true or false?
hint: Multi-line strings start and end with triple quote marks, but those quotes must not have text on the same line.

correct.answer:
var rossetti = """
For if the darkness and corruption leave
A vestige of the thoughts that once I had,
Better by far you should forget and smile
Than that you should remember and be sad.
"""
correct.reason: This creates a valid multi-line string.

correct.answer:
var burns = """
The best laid schemes
o' mice an' men
gang aft agley
"""
correct.reason: This creates a valid multi-line string.

correct.answer:
var wordsworth = """
I wandered lonely as a cloud
that floats on high
o'er vales and hills
"""
correct.reason: This creates a valid multi-line string.

correct.answer:
var shakespeare = """
To be or not to be
that is the question
"""
correct.reason: This creates a valid multi-line string.

correct.answer:
var joseph = """
When I am an old woman,
I shall wear purple
with a red hat that doesn't go,
and doesn't suit me
"""
correct.reason: This creates a valid multi-line string.

correct.answer:
var tennyson = """
Tis better to have loved
and lost than never
 to have loved at all
"""
correct.reason: This creates a valid multi-line string.

wrong.answer:
var coleridge = """
Water, water, everywhere
and not a drop to drink"""
wrong.reason: The final three quotes must be on a line by themselves.

wrong.answer:
var eliot = "This is the way the world ends
Not with a bang but with a whimper"
wrong.reason: Multi-line strings must start and end with three double quotes on lines by themselves.

wrong.answer:
var lear = "The Owl and the Pussy-cat went to sea

wrong.reason: Multi-line strings must start and end with three double quotes on lines by themselves.

I am the captain of my soul"""
wrong.reason: The final three quotes must be on a line by themselves.

wrong.reason: Multi-line strings must start and end with three double quotes on lines by themselves.
